outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to demonstrate the operational viability of Fuel-Cell drives in urban bus and their refueling infrastructure under Brazilian conditions. The project will achieve this through the following 6 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) A significant demonstration of the operational viability of fuel cell drives in urban buses and their refueling infrastructure under Brazilian conditions, (ii) A cadre of bus operators and staff trained in the operation, maintenance, and management of fuel cell buses, (iii) The accumulation of a substantial body of knowledge about reliability, failure modes and opportunities for improving the design of fuel cell buses for Brazil, (iv) Assessment of the performance of the electrolysis unit, (v) A proposal for Phase III of the Brazilian Fuel-cell Bus program that lays the foundation for the expansion of the market for and use of fuel cell buses and increases the involvement of local engineering and production of buses and (vi) Increased awareness and support of the public for an increased role for fuel cell buses in Brazil's urban transport system.

project_descr: Hydrogen Fuel Cell Buses for Urban Transport
